entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
